searchStrategy.grepSearch: Use grep for specific pattern matching
searchStrategy.fileReading: Read actual files, never assume contents
searchStrategy.firebaseMCP: Use Firebase MCP tools for Firebase operations

responseRequirements.noAssumptions: NEVER provide answers based on assumptions
responseRequirements.noSingleSource: NEVER stop after finding one source
responseRequirements.evidenceRequired: ALWAYS provide evidence from actual code
responseRequirements.citeSources: ALWAYS cite specific files and line numbers
responseRequirements.acknowledgeUncertainty: ALWAYS acknowledge if definitive answer not found

qualityAssurance.codeAnalysisRequired: Every answer must be backed by actual code analysis
qualityAssurance.multiSourceVerification: Every pattern must be verified through multiple sources
qualityAssurance.realCodebaseExamples: Every implementation must be based on real codebase examples
qualityAssurance.testedSolutions: Every solution must be tested and validated

errorPrevention.stoppingSearch: NEVER stop searching until you find the complete solution
errorPrevention.makingAssumptions: NEVER make assumptions - verify everything through codebase analysis
